Using an External Flash

Peripherals

2 In shooting mode, select FLASH
FUNCTION SETTING in the ↓ (FLASH
SETTING) menu tab. The options

MenuDescription
Built-In FlashDisplayed when the built-in flash is raised.123
SYNC TERMINALSync terminal options will be displayed if the built-in flash is lowered and either no flash unit, or an incompatible flash unit, is mounted on the hot shoe.339
SHOE MOUNT FLASHDisplayed when an optional flash unit other than the EF-X8 is mounted on the hot shoe and turned on.340
COMMANDER (OPTICAL)Displayed if an optional flash unit functioning as a com- mander for Fujifilm optical wireless remote flash control is connected and turned on.343
1 Connect the unit to the camera.

3 Highlight items using the focus stick
(focus lever) and rotate the rear com-
mand dial to change the highlighted
setting.



4 Press DISP/BACK to put the changes into effect.

content.markdown:
# Using an External Flash

Peripherals
and
Optional
Accessories

11

- 1 Connect the unit to the camera.


2 In shooting mode, select FLASH
FUNCTION SETTING in the ↓ (FLASH
SETTING) menu tab. The options
available vary with the flash unit.

![image](/image/placeholder)
IQ 、 FLASH SETTING
AF
MF
FLASH FUNCTION SETTING
RED EYE REMOVAL
TTL-LOCK MODE
LED LIGHT SETTING
COMMANDER SETTING

CH SETTING
MY
BACK EXIT

| Menu | Description |  |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Built-In Flash | Displayed when the built-in flash is raised. | 123 |
| SYNC TERMINAL | Sync terminal options will be displayed if the built-in flash is lowered and either no flash unit, or an incompatible flash unit, is mounted on the hot shoe. | 339 |
| SHOE MOUNT FLASH | Displayed when an optional flash unit other than the EF-X8 is mounted on the hot shoe and turned on. | 340 |
| COMMANDER (OPTICAL) | Displayed if an optional flash unit functioning as a com- mander for Fujifilm optical wireless remote flash control is connected and turned on. | 343 |


3 Highlight items using the focus stick
(focus lever) and rotate the rear com-
mand dial to change the highlighted
setting.

![image](/image/placeholder)
MODE
Built-In Flash
TTL ±0 2.0 +2.0
· Y
TTL MODE 红TL SYNC. FRONT
ZOOM ANGLE
ADJUST BACK END

4 Press DISP/BACK to put the changes into effect.

338
